ch.nolix.color

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.element.Element
      • ch.nolix.color.Color
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackgroundColor, TextColor

    public class Color
extends Element
    This class represents a true color. A true color is a color that consists of a blue, green and red value.
